Producer: Andrew Berg, Laure Vaysse, Nik Bower, John Sachs
Rating: R (Strong Bloody Violence|Language Throughout|Brief Drug Use)
Synopsis: Released from prison, a talented boxer wants nothing more than to reconnect with his young son and live a quiet life. But when his brother gets on the wrong side of a shady developer, he must risk everything to save his sibling before it's too late.
Title: The Corrupted
